description:
The Magic User’s Club is going to the beach! There’ll be sun, sand, and skimpy suits… But it’s not all fun and games. Mizuha Miyama and her entourage are there too, and she has plans for Takeo’s ultimate humiliation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sea, the Cave, and a Magic Party
Umi to, Doukutsu to, Magic Party
海と, 洞窟と, マジックパーティー
